ygData.subject: Re: OOC for the council
ygData.msgSnippet: His RPG shouldn t have anything to do with the Neo Beast Wars. That s HIS little thing. I could actually care less about it, because I don t watch Beast

His RPG shouldn't have anything to do with the Neo Beast Wars. That's 
HIS little thing. I could actually care less about it, because I 
don't watch Beast Machines. Don't worry about it, RoboRick.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> OOC: In David Torey's new Neo Beast Machines RPG, he has chenged the
> status of Cybertron. He has Magmatron controlling the planet, like
> Megatron does in the show. what I am asking is if those changes, are
> going to be accepted in the Neo Beast Wars RPG?
